subsection.name: System Context Properties
subsection.p: The following properties are used by the default transit implementation during the establishment of a system context. Property values are resolved from system properties and properties declared in the file ${user.home}/dpml.properties.

tr.td: The directory to be used by an application when resolving extension jar files declared within a jar manifest in accordance with the Jar Optional Extensions specification.
An artifact reference to the logging system plugin to be used.
The logging configuration file to be supplied to the the logging system.

A value of 'true' or 'false' that declares if strict a profile creation policy is to be applied. When strict policy is enabled a component type must declare a profile before it can be considered as a candidate during assembly. If strict profile handling is disabled then metro will construct an implicit profile for the type.
